me.donkeycore.dpl.plugin

Class PluginLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.dpl.plugin.PluginLoader

  • public class PluginLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton class loads all DPlugin classes found in JARs.
    Default plugin location folder: donkey/plugins/
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    DPlugin

      Return the list of enabled plugins.
      protected void loadPlugins()
      Loads all DPlugin classes found in JARs.
      Default plugin location folder: donkey/plugins/

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultPluginLoader

        public static final PluginLoader getDefaultPluginLoader()
        Retrieve the default PluginLoader class. It always points to this specific class.
        Returns:
        The default plugin loader
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPluginLoader

        public static final PluginLoader getPluginLoader()
        Retrieve the current PluginLoader class. It is changeable by plugins.
        Returns:
        The current plugin loader
        Since:
        1.0

      • setPluginLoader

        public static final PluginLoader setPluginLoader(PluginLoader l)
        Set the current PluginLoader class.
        Parameters:
        l - The new PluginLoader to replace the old one
        Returns:
        The old plugin loader
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPlugins

        public DPlugin[] getPlugins()
        Return the list of enabled plugins.
        Returns:
        An array of DPlugin objects
        Since:
        1.0

      • loadPlugins

        protected void loadPlugins()
        Loads all DPlugin classes found in JARs.
        Default plugin location folder: donkey/plugins/
        Since:
        1.0
